name: Nasi Lemak
description: Rice cooked in coconut milk and pandan leaf served with sambal.

name: Murtabak
description: A Yemeni stuffed pancake or pan-fried bread.

name: Otak-otak
description: Grilled fishcake, often wrapped in banana leaves.

name: Sate
description: Skewered and grilled meat served with peanut sauce.

name: Chicken Rendang
description: Tender chicken stewed in coconut milk and spices.
